review: Dr Narmatha has been a true blessing for us in our pregnancy journey.She patiently answered all our queries and supported us emotionally til the delivery.She closely monitored my pregnancy due to gestational diabetes and high bp and safely delivered our baby.i am perfectly healthy after delivery and my baby is also doing great.We are truly indebted to her for her empathetic nature and proactive treatment in our pregnancy journey. We strongly reccomend Dr Narmatha for all couples wishing for a smooth pregnancy journey.

Dr. Narmatha is an excellent doctor. She is expert. She explained the issue in detail, answered all queries very patiently and guided us. I had very pleasant experience with the doctor and will choose only her for any future queries. Even the staff was very polite and helpful.
Dr Narmatha was very friendly and explained in detailed.Give good suggestions to take care of our health.

its needless to say that how good the culture is. every one is very helpful and specially the doctor is amazing. she is very friendly. she suggests like a family member. i am very happy with the consultation. its worth giving money. 

highly recommend you for this!!!!!
She is really honest and kind which is a rarity in today's world . I had a great experience with her . Highly recommend .
